attributes.action: Sack Richard Brunstrom, the chief constable of North Wales, because he is no longer fit for purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man is preciding over a public service that is costing rate payers more and more for less and less every year. He prefers to target motorists rather than criminals that are destroying our communities whilst advocating schemes such as the legalisation of all drugs. His intelectual stability appears questionable and a more public orientated person should be found to replace him.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
